'''''Vinyar Tengwar 25''''' is the twenty-fifth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|24|26}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "''Íre Manwe''" — Patrick H. Wynne
* E.L.F. News
* Letters to ''VT''

* "From the ''Mortale Valinóreva''" — trans. Patrick H. Wynne
* "The Subscript Dot: A New ''Tehta'' Usage" — Arden R. Smith
* "An [[Adunaic]] Dictionary" — Carl F. Hostetter and Patrick H. Wynne
